title: Fonts in La repubblica
content:
Please help me identify this two fonts. They are used in italian newspaper La repubblica.

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LR-naslov.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406144406/http:/typophile.com/files/LR-naslov.jpg) | 21.37 KB |
| [LR-text.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406144406/http:/typophile.com/files/LR-text.jpg) | 31.33 KB |
author: primoz

comments.content: Though strangely with a different width and comma. Possibly a previous or custom version?

Yer. The comma is roundish only in the Monotype version.  
Also the ear on the ‘g’ is slightly more upwards pointing.
